channel.title: Al Jazeera – Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera
channel.description: Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera

image.title: Al Jazeera – Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera
image.description: Breaking News, World News and Video from Al Jazeera

item.title: Hamas had not planned to attack music festival, Israeli report says

description.#cdata-section: First police investigation of Supernova festival also found Israeli forces responsible for some deaths.

item.title: Biden writes two different letters on Gaza war, reflecting his US audience

description.#cdata-section: Messages to pro-Palestinian and pro-Israel Americans aren't contradictory but it's an uncommon White House practice.

item.title: No end to Palestinian suffering with no end to Israel’s war on Gaza

description.#cdata-section: Many people were killed and wounded in Israeli attacks on two schools in northern Gaza.

item.title: Large protests against Catalan amnesty deal in Madrid after PM sworn in

description.#cdata-section: About 170,000 took to the streets, a day after Prime Minister Pedro Sanchez was sworn in for a second term.

item.title: Is US support for Israel damaging Washington’s global standing?

description.#cdata-section: Critics warn of consequences of Washington's staunch backing of Israel's war on Gaza.

item.title: Families of Israeli captives arrive in Jerusalem, rally at PM’s office

description.#cdata-section: Family, friends and supporters of Hamas captives marched from Tel Aviv to demand immediate release, government action.

item.title: Thousands rally across Iran to protest Gaza deaths, slam Israel and US

description.#cdata-section: Protests in Tehran and other cities were held in 'support of the oppressed children of Gaza'.

item.title: Through K-pop and Quechua, singer Lenin Tamayo celebrates his Andean roots

description.#cdata-section: A new viral music sensation is drawing on Andean traditions to create songs that showcase a marginalised identity.

item.title: Wounded Palestinian children evacuated from Gaza to UAE

description.#cdata-section: Fifteen Palestinians, including eight children, have been flown to Abu Dhabi from Gaza for treatment in the UAE.

item.title: Is Biden’s stance on Israel out of sync with mainstream America?

description.#cdata-section: US political analyst Jon Alterman of CSIS says Israel will have to rethink how it's approaching the Palestinians.

item.title: Lisbon’s Mayor Moedas: Leading the city’s rise as a global innovation hub

description.#cdata-section: Carlos Moedas on making Portugal’s capital an entrepreneurship centre amid a national political crisis.

item.title: India vs Australia: ICC Cricket World Cup 2023 final preview

description.#cdata-section: Unbeaten hosts India will take on five-time champions Australia in the Cricket World Cup final in Ahmedabad.

item.title: COP28 must not repeat the mistakes of the Africa Climate Summit

description.#cdata-section: Lobbyists for big emitters in the Global North must not be allowed to push false solutions on COP28.

item.title: What we know about evacuation of Gaza’s al-Shifa hospital

description.#cdata-section: Doctors, patients and thousands of people sheltering in Gaza’s al-Shifa hospital were given one hour to evacuate.

item.title: Many killed in Israeli attacks on two schools in northern Gaza

description.#cdata-section: Hundreds of Palestinians sought shelter at schools, survivors use shovels and hands to extricate people from rubble.

item.title: ‘A lot of discontent’: Netanyahu alone as Israel turns on wartime PM

description.#cdata-section: From families of Hamas captives to politicians in his own government, Netanyahu's popularity is at an all-time low.

item.title: IMF could augment Egypt’s loan programme over effects of Gaza war

description.#cdata-section: Managing Director Kristalina Georgieva says the Israel-Gaza war has had an economic effect on neighbouring countries.

item.title: ‘There are no excuses in fighting’: Khai Wu on MMA and training Zuckerberg

description.#cdata-section: PFL fighter tells Al Jazeera about the 'beauty' of martial arts and how training Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg inspires him.

item.title: Gaza’s food is running out amid Israel’s ‘war of starvation’

description.#cdata-section: Closure of crossings to the Gaza Strip, displacement of thousands and bombing of bakeries have worsened the food crisis.

item.title: Israel agrees to allow ‘minimal’ two trucks of fuel a day into Gaza

description.#cdata-section: Decision was made partly to prevent epidemics that would 'harm' civilians and its troops on the ground, Israel says.

item.title: Gambia parents ‘fight for children’ in landmark trial on India syrup deaths

description.#cdata-section: At least 70 children died on taking the toxic medicine. Their parents are suing the Gambian government and drugmaker.

item.title: ‘My father didn’t beat my mother in a gypsy fashion – he just beat her’

description.#cdata-section: Famed Roma activist Gelu Duminică on challenging stereotypes and changing the dictionary definition of the word 'gypsy'.

item.title: Young Argentinians want change. Many see Javier Milei as their best option

description.#cdata-section: Milei, one of two candidates in Sunday's run-off election, has whipped up a devoted following among young male voters.

item.title: Australia could be India’s ‘banana skin’ in Cricket World Cup final

description.#cdata-section: Australia are peaking with unbeaten hosts India 'ripe for the picking', Aussie legend Jason Gillespie tells Al Jazeera.

item.title: Israeli air strikes kill 28 Palestinians in southern Gaza

description.#cdata-section: Dozens of people remain under the rubble after attacks on two residential areas in Khan Younis.
